TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClaimsAuthenticationManager extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定义身份验证管理器的基本实现。

span.span: Defines the base implementation for a claims authentication manager.

summary.span: 声明验证管理器在声明处理管道中提供某一位置以便将处理逻辑（筛选、验证、扩展）在执行到达您的应用程序代码之前应用于传入主体的声明集合。

span.span: The claims authentication manager provides a place in the claims processing pipeline for applying processing logic (filtering, validation, extension) to the claims collection in the incoming principal before execution reaches your application code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明身份验证管理器提供应用程序声明处理管道中的一个扩展点, 你可以使用该扩展点来验证、筛选、修改传入声明, 或将新声明注入到 RP 之前的声明集执行应用程序代码。The claims authentication manager provides an extensibility point in the application's claims processing pipeline that you can use to validate, filter, modify, incoming claims or inject new claims into the set of claims presented by a before the RP application code is executed. 如果 RP 应用程序需要, 甚至可以返回的自定义实现。You can even return a custom implementation of if your RP application requires it. 类提供的默认实现返回未修改的中的声明; 不过, 你可以从此类派生并重写方法, 以修改中的声明 (或返回自定义).The default implementation provided by the class returns the claims in the unmodified; however, you can derive from this class and override the method to modify the claims in the (or to return a custom ). 创建自定义声明身份验证管理器的一个典型原因是, 根据或不知道的信息添加、删除或转换声明, 这可能会更好地由 RP 应用程序维护。A typical reason for creating a custom claims authentication manager is to add, remove, or transform claims based on information that is only known by or is, perhaps, better maintained by the RP application. 例如, 在购物车应用程序中购买客户的历史记录可能保存在由 RP 应用程序维护的数据库中, 然后根据在中找到的名称声明的值添加到声明身份验证管理器返回的声明主体。传入主体。For example, a history of customer purchases in a shopping cart application might be kept in a data base maintained by the RP application and then added to the claims principal returned by the claims authentication manager based on the value of a name claim found in the incoming principal. 可以通过`ClaimsAuthenticationManager` [claimsAuthenticationManager <元素 (该元素是的子元素) 使用类或配置, 将应用程序配置为以编程方式使用。> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md)identityConfiguration 元素)。 [ <> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)You can configure your application to use a `ClaimsAuthenticationManager` either programmatically by using the class or in configuration through the [<claimsAuthenticationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md) element (which is a child element of the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element). 您可以重写方法, 以便为可通过其配置自定义``管理器的元素的自定义子元素提供处理。You can override the method to provide processing for custom child elements of the `` element through which your custom manager can be configured. 的基实现不处理任何子元素。The base implementation of does not handle any child elements. 将应用程序配置为使用声明身份验证管理器可确保它将由 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 从请求管道调用。Configuring your application to use a claims authentication manager ensures that it will be invoked by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) from the request pipeline. ## Examples 下面的代码演示了一个简单的声明身份验证管理器, 它将角色声明添加到传入主体, 而无需对传入声明执行任何检查。The following code shows a simple claims authentication manager that adds a role claim to the incoming principal without performing any check on the incoming claims. [!code-csharp[WifWebApplication1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwebapplication1/cs/myclaimsauthenticationmanager/simpleclaimsauthenticatonmanager.cs#1)] 下面的 XML 显示``元素。The following XML shows the `` element. ```xml ... ```

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal Authenticate(string resourceName, class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal incomingPrincipal) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Authenticate (resourceName As String, incomingPrincipal As ClaimsPrincipal) As ClaimsPrincipal

abstract member Authenticate : string * System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal -> System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal override this.Authenticate : string * System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal -> System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal

span.span: The address of the resource that is being requested.

param.name: incomingPrincipal
param.span: 表示正在尝试访问资源的经过身份验证的用户的声明主体。

span.span: The claims principal that represents the authenticated user that is attempting to access the resource.

summary.span: 在派生中重写时，将返回与 RP 应用程序的要求一致的 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a object consistent with the requirements of the RP application.

summary.span: 默认实现未修改传入的 。

returns.span: 包含 RP 应用程序所需任何修改的声明主体。

span.span: A claims principal that contains any modifications necessary for the RP application.

returns.span: 默认实现返回未被修改的传入声明主体。

span.span: The default implementation returns the incoming claims principal unmodified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从请求处理管道调用方法,您可以在派生类中重写此方法,以便根据RP应用程序的策略筛选、修改或将声明注入声明主体。The method is called from the request processing pipeline You can override this method in a derived class to filter, modify, or inject claims into the claims principal according to the policy of your RP application. 你甚至可以返回的自定义实现, 具体取决于 RP 应用程序的要求。Depending on the requirements of the RP application, you can even return a custom implementation of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodelist) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (nodelist As XmlNodeList)
abstract member LoadCustomConfiguration : System.Xml.XmlNodeList -> unit override this.LoadCustomConfiguration : System.Xml.XmlNodeList -> unit

param.name: nodelist
param.span: 列表中的每个节点都属于 类型。

span.span: Each node in the list is of type .

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将从 XML 中加载自定义配置。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由配置基础结构调用。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 调用此方法时, `nodelist`将包含配置文件中的[ <claimsAuthenticationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md)元素的顶级子元素。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<claimsAuthenticationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md) element from the configuration file. 其中每个元素反过来都包含特性或子元素, 具体取决于为派生类定义的配置架构。Each of these elements may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 如果在配置文件中的``元素下未显示任何子元素, 则不会调用此方法。If no child elements appear under the `` element in the configuration file, this method is not called. 默认实现引发。The default implementation throws a . 在派生类中重写此方法可以从配置文件中启用声明身份验证管理器的初始化。Override this method in your derived class to enable initialization of your claims authentication manager from a configuration file. 例如, 配置元素可以描述在对声明主体进行身份验证时要遵循的策略;还可以使用它们指向要将其他声明添加到主体中的属性存储。For example, the configuration elements might describe a policy to be followed when authenticating a claims principal; or they might be used to point to an attribute store from which additional claims are to be added to the principal.
